com.gridgraph.graphcore.transaction

Interface IMetaDataTransaction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGridTransaction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GraphMetaDataTransaction

    public interface IMetaDataTransaction
extends IGridTransaction
    Interface that defines operation on meta data to be supported by transaction mechanism
    Note: note that for almost ALL the methods provided by this class, an explicit parameter isn't listed, means the graph object. Actually, transaction knows well what the current graph is, and all the related operation will be for this 'current' graph. Note: note that all the interfaces mentioned here are to be provided and thus defined by @Aqiang, so here is for design purpose for now
    Author:
    guobao.chen

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.gridgraph.graphcore.transaction.IGridTransaction

        IGridTransaction.Exceptions

      • setDefaultSchema

        void setDefaultSchema(String schemaName)
        Set default schema to the graph. If schemaName is not a valid schema, throw exception. If the default schema already exist, override it.
        Parameters:
        schemaName - schema name

      • getDefaultSchema

        GraphSchema getDefaultSchema()
        Get the default schema of the graph
        Returns:
        the default schema, null if not exist.

      • createSchemaProperty

        SchemaProperty createSchemaProperty(String label,
                                    String propertyName,
                                    GridDataType type,
                                    GridDataType subType,
                                    boolean unique,
                                    boolean nullable,
                                    Object defaultValue)
        Creates a new property for specified schema
        Parameters:
        label - schema for which the property is to be created
        propertyName - property name
        type - property type
        subType - this is used for List type, set to null if the property is not List type
        unique - unique or not
        nullable - nullable or not
        defaultValue - default value in case value is not specified

      • schemas

        Map<String,GraphSchema> schemas()
        Returns all schema for current graph in a Map for format, which contains schema name as key and schema instance as values
        Returns:
        a map representing schemas for current graph

      • createDegreeIndex

        GraphDegreeIndex createDegreeIndex(String indexName,
                                   IndexSortDirection direction,
                                   String... label)
        Creates a new degree index (containing in-, out-, total-degree) for the graph, by specifying index name, label (schema name, or null for all schemas) and index sorting direction
        Parameters:
        indexName - name of the index to be created
        label - name of schema, or null to indicate the index is for all schemas
        direction - used to indicate index sorting direction
        Returns:
        the created degree index

      • dropDegreeIndex

        void dropDegreeIndex(String indexName)
        Drops a degree index (containing in-, out-, total-degree) by specifying the index name
        Parameters:
        indexName - name of the degree index to be dropped
